entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
